item.title: "Security in the Third Wave of IT Engineering"
item.description: Today I gave a presentation at UNAM's 2011 Computer Security Conference in Mexico City. Below you will find my presentation (done using prezi.com, follow this link if you can't see it below). You can also get the PDF version. Security in the Third Wave of IT Engineering on Prezi Related blog posts from cfengine.com: CFEngine - The Third Wave of Configuration Management CFEngine, SysAdmin 3.0 and the Third Wave of IT Engineering
